plot outline: Watch the full movie, Azhaagana Naakal, only on Eros Now. Azhaagana Naatkal is a 2001 Indian Tamil film, directed by Sundar C and produced by S. D. Selvan. The film stars Karthik, Rambha, Mumtaj and Goundamani in lead roles. The film had musical score by Deva.
